actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of approximately 4,000 acres of land to the Kehoe Lake project on Little Sandy River and Tygarts Greek, Ky.

summary.text: Provides for the addition of approximately four thousand acres of land to the Kehoe Lake project, authorized by the Flood Control Act of 1966, on Little Sandy River and Tygarts Creek, Kentucky.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the addition of approximately 4,000 acres of land to the Kehoe Lake project on Little Sandy River and Tygarts Greek, Ky.
